title: Man, 47, dead in Overbrook stabbing | CBC News
text:
A 47-year-old man has died in a stabbing in Ottawa's Overbrook neighbourhood Sunday morning.

Police said two victims were found at the corner of Whitton Crescent and Whitton Place around 2:40 a.m.

The second victim was taken to hospital with serious stab wounds, police said.

Ottawa police Staff Sgt. Bruce Pirt said the scene itself is quite large, with investigators still trying to determine what led to the stabbing.

"We have a number of people in custody and we're still trying to determine the series of events surrounding it," he said.

Three people have been arrested and the Ottawa Police Service's major crime unit is investigating.
description: A 47-year-old man has died in a stabbing east of Ottawa's core Sunday morning.
